author: geonmo
body:
1. Add scripts "MakePlot.py" 
   - Include "usage".
2. Add function to calculate efficiency plots.
   - TProfile and TH1 can not provide Asymmetry error. So, this function return "large error".
3. Fix label "station2"->"station2_short" and "station3"->"station2_long"
title: Code cleaning and fix label of plots.
